Here begynneth the holy lyfe and history of saynt werburge very frutefull for all christen people to rede. Bradshaw, Henry, d. 1513.
[224] p. : port.
Imprinted by Richarde Pynson, printer to the kynges noble grace, with priuilege to hym graunted by our souerayne lorde the kynge, [[London] : A⁰. M.D.xxi[1521]]
By Henry Bradshaw, whose name appears in the prologue. In verse. Imprint from colophon. Signatures: [par.]⁴ a-s·⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
